HDG.BC.content: [alibis] “have done (fertig)” w/ Being by appealing to this/that being (avoid abode [of Being]) > abode (Aufenhaltes) [of Being] contains an exacting expectation (Zumutung), demand to experience abode of historical man, originates from claim of Being itself, claim comes from still-concealed essence of history > a strange demand, don’t minimize [lose hold] of this strangeness (Befremdlichkeit), we need history itself to make us remember, give us hints for reflection, a reflection that grants us remembrance of 1st inception of Western thought [strangeness as trace] > why is that? only inception itself can tell us [heterotautology?]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [alibis] “have done (fertig)” w/ Being by appealing to this/that being (avoid abode [of Being]) > abode (Aufenhaltes) [of Being] contains an exacting expectation (Zumutung), demand to experience abode of historical man, originates from claim of Being itself, claim comes from still-concealed essence of history > a strange demand, don’t minimize [lose hold] of this strangeness (Befremdlichkeit), we need history itself to make us remember, give us hints for reflection, a reflection that grants us remembrance of 1st inception of Western thought [strangeness as trace] > why is that? only inception itself can tell us [heterotautology?]

HDG.WM.content: practical goals, technical organization: unites dispersed atrophied sciences [Husserl] > exactness of science vs. rigor of philosophy
